## Tender Announcement

### Arctic Naval Distillate Fuel RFP

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) issues this tender for the supply of Arctic Naval Distillate Fuel. The CPPC Ltd., acting as the contracting authority, has contracted the PSPC to be the governing contact and oversee the execution of this bid.

**Tender Details:**

*   Solicitation Number: WS4606211512
*   Publication Date: May 27, 2024
*   Tender Closing Date: June 12, 2024, at 14:00 HAE
*   Expected Contract Start Date: July 1, 2024
*   Expected Contract End Date: November 30, 2024
*   Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding

**Scope of Work:**

The Canadian Coast Guard requires approximately 6,600,000 litres of Naval Distillate Fuel, comprising 5,800,000 litres of firm quantity and 800,000 litres of optional quantity. The fuel is needed between July 29 and October 6, 2024, for eight deliveries by ship-to-ship at various locations in the Arctic.

**Regional Coverage:**

Deliveries will be made to multiple locations across Nunavut, including Rankin Inlet, Coral Harbour (Foxe Channel), Cambridge Bay, Grise Fiord, Barrow Strait, and Resolute.

**Terms and Conditions:**

Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements will apply for deliveries to the designated locations.

**Tender Criteria:**

Bidders must provide the required supporting documentation and submit their bid on June 12, 2024, at 14:00 HAE. Bids submitted after this deadline will be considered non-responsive.

**Buyer Contact Information:**

Interested parties should contact Bobbi MacLeod (SPAC/PSPC) at (bobbi.macleod@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) for further details.

**Notice URL:**

The full tender package and additional information can be accessed on the Ariba Discovery website: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19829563?extsite=MTk4Mjk1NjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19829563?extsite=MTk4Mjk1NjNfQU4wMTQ
